main.name: Bryan Martirez
main.description: I mainly do front-end and sometimes back-end projects. My main tech stacks are React, Redux, GraphQL, & Node but I'm always learning and trying out new stuff
main.bio: I learned JS as a hobby through self-taught courses with the help of friends, online groups and the freecodecamp community. I like to code things and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser. Occasionally I help out beginners in online groups and forums as a way to give back to the community.
main.contactmessage: If you wanna get in touch, do a project, or want to work together, feel free to send a message below.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the tech stacks that I had the pleasure of working with, but I always try out new stuff as they come along.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electronic and Communications Engineering

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Develop and maintain Fiddle's main Inventory app, front-page and components across multiple microservices. I create and maintain reusable components using Storybook, and add new customer requested features. I have experience with multiple tech stacks mainly React, Redux, Apollo, GraphQL, & Node.

work.title: API and Integrations Support Engineer
work.description: Work together with partner Devs in helping build integrated apps with the Five9 application. I worked with Five9 partner integrations such as Salesforce, Zoho, Zendesk, Netsuite and Velocify.

work.title: Technical Support Engineer
work.description: Worked as a tech support to customers, providing front and remote support across multiple products.

testimonials.text: I like Bryan, he seems sharp.
